column3: 1 brisket dinner and a side of pulled pork and a Texas link fed myself and my husband for nearly 3 days
column4: so overall a very good value.  Compared to my beloved Salt Lick
column5: this is a four star joint. That being said
column6: this is Chicago and if you love bbq
column7: you need Smoque in your life
column8: ASAP.  It surpasses the hype and truly raises Chicago bbq to a whole new level.
